quality_assessment: FAQ is comprehensive and well-structured, but has command syntax inconsistencies that need correction

issues.section: How do I retry failed DLQ items?
issues.description: FAQ shows 'prodigy dlq show <job_id>' but the actual CLI command is 'prodigy dlq list'
issues.fix_suggestion: Update command to use 'prodigy dlq list' which matches the actual CLI implementation

issues.section: How do I retry failed DLQ items?
issues.description: FAQ shows '--max-parallel' flag but the actual CLI flag is '--parallel'
issues.fix_suggestion: Update flag to use '--parallel' which is the actual flag name in DlqCommands::Retry

issues.description: FAQ shows 'prodigy events follow' but this command does not exist in the CLI
issues.should_be: Remove this example or note it's not implemented
issues.fix_suggestion: Either implement 'prodigy events follow' command or remove this example and only show working commands like 'prodigy events ls --job-id <job_id>'

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of common troubleshooting scenarios
Includes practical code examples for most questions
Good cross-references to detailed documentation sections
Covers both basic and advanced troubleshooting topics
Includes helpful tips like checking json_log_location for debugging
Provides good context about file locations and system behavior
All internal documentation links are valid and working
improvement_suggestions: Verify all CLI commands match actual implementation
Add a question about how to debug streaming output issues
Include a question about MapReduce agent failures and how to debug them
Add troubleshooting for common git worktree issues
Consider adding a 'Common Errors' section with error messages and solutions
Add examples of common error patterns and how to resolve them
